channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Archer (Blue Dragon)
channel.description:
**Archer** _Blue Dragon Killing_
Night Ability: Crossbow - Shoot somebody and kill them. If you shoot a Blue Dragon member you will take your own life. Not usable until Night Two. (3)
Additional Information: If you shoot somebody, it will still kill them, but the following night you will “commit suicide” over guilt over shooting a Blue Dragon member.
Converted Into..
**Shooter** _Unseen Killing_
Day Ability: Barriered Up - Make Unseen members immune at night. (2)
Night Ability 1: Bam Bam! - Shoot somebody and kill them. This will not count as a visit. (2)
Night Ability 2: Shootout - Shoot somebody, and shoot everybody who visits your target. (2)
Additional Information: If you shoot out a poisoned / bleeding person and a phys visits, you will kill the phys, and the target. This should not kill immune people though.

item.description:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ztVMib1T4T4

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Archer (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Archer is just ToS vigilante. Exactly. Knight does it better, since Cold Steel only kills one person on a misfire, has infinite uses, and Sacrifice.

Shooter’s Bam! Bam! Is just 2 extra kills. The extra kills are OP. Barriered up is covered by Enforcer I think.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Archer (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
If it’s going to be an evil Killing, which should only be for Cult, it should be something like the proposed Acolyte that either buffs the existing methods of killing or very indirect killing. Unseen already has enough KP as it is.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Archer (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
This just seems like a straight up worse Knight that converts into a second assassin with a rampaging attack. Both of which are bad thing’s
